parameters.name: ConnectionStatus
parameters.description:
The state of the endpoint connection. Valid values:

*   **Pending**: The endpoint connection is being modified.
*   **Connecting**: The endpoint connection is being established.
*   **Connected**: The endpoint connection is established.
*   **Disconnecting**: The endpoint is being disconnected from the endpoint service.
*   **Disconnected**: The endpoint is disconnected from the endpoint service.
*   **Deleting**: The connection is being deleted.
*   **ServiceDeleted**: The corresponding endpoint service has been deleted.

parameters.name: EndpointStatus
parameters.description:
The state of the endpoint. Valid values:

*   **Creating**: The endpoint is being created.
*   **Active**: The endpoint is available.
*   **Pending**: The endpoint is being modified.
*   **Deleting**: The endpoint is being deleted.

parameters.name: EndpointType
parameters.description:
The type of the endpoint. Valid values:

*   **Interface**: interface endpoint
*   **Reverse**: reverse endpoint

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Valid values: **1** to **1000**. Default value: **50**.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description:
The pagination token that is used in the next request to retrieve a new page of results. Valid values:

*   If this is your first request and no next requests are to be performed, you do not need to specify this parameter.
*   If a next request is to be performed, set the parameter to the value of **NextToken** that is returned from the last call.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the endpoint.

You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~120468~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group.

parameters.name: ServiceName
parameters.description: The name of the endpoint service with which the endpoint is associated.

parameters.name: VpcId
parameters.description: The ID of the VPC to which the endpoint belongs.
